body:
- Support QMCPACK wave function converter for QE 6.7
- Support parallel builds for QE 6.6 and later
- Fix issue with recent versions of QE and Intel MKL package.

There are still issue with `^intel-mkl ^mpich` and may be related to this issue here:
https://github.com/spack/spack/issues/22982
title: QE April 2021
